text:
Welcome to our study

Before you begin, please enter your student number in the box below. Once you have entered your student number, please press start to begin the study.

Type Case

The following screen displays a question for 2 seconds. There will then be a short pause before you are presented with a word. You then have 4 seconds to answer whether that word correctly answers the original question.

When you are ready, press start.

Thank you for completing the previous task.

You will now watch a video, lasting a couple of minutes. The video has sound. Please make sure you volume is low enough not to disturb those around you. You may mute your speakers if you wish.

When you are ready to begin watching, press play.

Recall

The following task requires you to recall as many of the words from the previous 'Types' task as you can. Each word will be displayed in turn along with 'Yes/No' response buttons. Simply indicate whether you recognise the word or not.

When you are ready, press start.

Thank you for completing the study

We're collecting data across all three seminars and you'll get to see the results next week.

When you are ready to leave, press finish.

You may now close your browser

Please ignore any messages about leaving without saving your data.
